AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Noldor elf-child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Growing up in a time of relative peace but still at odds of war with the mountain roaming Goblins and Orcs, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood practicing combat and crafting while studying during [PAWN_possessive] leisure time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Teleri elf-child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Living at the shores during [PAWN_possessive] younger days, [PAWN_nameDef] helped out with delivering resources to the shipwrights and learned the basics of ship-making.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sindar elf-child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Keeping to HIMself just like [PAWN_possessive] kin, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood studying books of ages past. Having no real connection to the outside world past [PAWN_possessive] kin, [PAWN_nameDef] wasn’t open to new faces.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Falmari elf-child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up being taught the ways of art and song. The tales of [PAWN_possessive] people within the artistry had always kindled a great curiosity in [PAWN_possessive] heart. HE would often venture out into the nearby forests seeking a glimpse of the doings of the world outside the safety of the lands of [PAWN_possessive] kin.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Nandor elf-child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Growing up in the forest, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] time tending to the deer herds and tree groves, shut away from the outside world. HE knew little of the doings of those that lived beyond the wooden lands of [PAWN_possessive] kin but fostered great knowledge and kinship with the workings of the natural world around [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] stalked the forests and plains, killing from afar anyone who trespassed on [PAWN_possessive] lord’s land. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to be quick on [PAWN_possessive] feet and stealthy with [PAWN_possessive] tactics to catch intruders and dispense justice with impunity.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] decided that HE was going to take up arms under [PAWN_possessive] lord’s name. [PAWN_pronoun] sought to test himself against stronger and stronger foes wherever he could find them. In doing so, [PAWN_pronoun] became so revered for [PAWN_possessive] abilities in combat that HE eventually became exceedingly proud and conceited.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf smith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved the heat of the forge, the striking song of precious metals ringing under hammers, and the joy of creation. [PAWN_pronoun] became a renowned smith among [PAWN_possessive] people and wished only for more designs and metals with which to work his craft.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent decades cooking while living on [PAWN_possessive] own. [PAWN_possessive] culinary skills bringing [PAWN_objective] great comfort and satisfaction until one day he decided to share his passion. Eventually, [PAWN_possessive] finest meals became widely celebrated by those fortunate enough to taste them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf poet
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As HE came of age, [PAWN_nameDef] grew quite fond of the art of weaving words. HE strove to become an orator of renown. [PAWN_possessive] charismatic command of language led [PAWN_objective] to be widely sought after, not just for poems, but for the comfort of [PAWN_possessive] company and [PAWN_possessive] skillful negotiations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf musician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Having much fondness for the soft sounds of elven instruments and the kind of lyrics of [PAWN_possessive] peoples songs, [PAWN_nameDef] seeks to keep the elven memories alive through meter and note, tone and pitch, and the sound of soothing strings and silver harps.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf shipwright
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Knowing well enough the legends of [PAWN_possessive] people, [PAWN_nameDef] made it his life's work to build and design sailing ships worthy of [PAWN_possessive] lord's favor and aspires to become the master builder of the vessel which will spirit away his kin on the great journey.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf kinslayer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After HE was discovered murdering [PAWN_possessive] kin, [PAWN_nameDef] was exiled by [PAWN_possessive] brothers and sisters. [PAWN_pronoun] vowed revenge, and took to finding, hunting down, and killing [PAWN_possessive] siblings. When [PAWN_possessive] mission was complete, HE wandered the forests in search of more folk, kin or no kin, all would fail to stop [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf architect
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Taking great interest in the deep history and methodology of Elven architecture, [PAWN_nameDef] spent decades studying how to perform feats of engineering that seemed impossible to the other peoples of the world. [PAWN_pronoun] soon became adept at shaping the world around [PAWN_objective], without destroying it, and HE became an expert Elven architect.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Yavinildi elf-maiden
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the Yavinildi. [PAWN_pronoun] is a Maiden of Yavanna, charged with preparing lembas, the elven waybread, by using the lembas crops from the fields. This sacred duty is one HE takes very seriously, and the thought of anything attempting to spoil the purity of [PAWN_possessive] work is one that instantly raises [PAWN_nameDef]'s alarm.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf healer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master of the healing arts, and people came from all around in search of [PAWN_possessive] care, whether for the mending of the flesh, simple tonics, salves, and tinctures, or treatment of more serious debilitating diseases. It is even rumored that HE could, with but a touch, restore health to one’s heart and snatch away the aches in one’s limbs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf herbalist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent the summer of their lives healing others through nature’s bounties. Some herbs worked better than others, and through countless years of trial and error coupled with the wisdom of [PAWN_possessive] elders, HE became a herbalist.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Elf lord
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: For when the strength of MEN fails, an elf-lord stands ready. [PAWN_nameDef] attained the position after decades of serfice and the tragic loss of [PAWN_possessive] lord. At the behest of [PAWN_possessive] kin, HE arose as the ruler who would guide [PAWN_possessive] people for centuries to come.
